amendment.description: Amendment sought to eliminate funds for the Community Development loan guarantee program and to apply the savings to the spending reduction account.
amendment.purpose: An amendment numbered 11 printed in the Congressional Record to zero out the funding for the Community Development Loan Guarantees Program Account and to apply the savings to the spending reduction account.

vote.text: On agreeing to the McClintock amendment (A029) Failed by recorded vote: 123 - 300 (Roll no. 435).

action.text: Amendment failed in Committee of the Whole
Roll call votes on amendments in House
House amendment not agreed to: On agreeing to the McClintock amendment (A029) Failed by recorded vote: 123 - 300 (Roll no. 435).
House amendment offered/reported by: Amendment (A029) offered by Mr. McClintock.
